original_text: People say that nobody takes care of you, people of Zion. They say that I have chased you out of your land. But I will give you back your health. I will make your wounds better.’ That is what the Lord says. People say that nobody takes care of you,
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 그들이 쫓겨난 자라 하매 시온을 찾는 자가 없은즉 내가 너의 상처로부터 새 살이 돋아나게 하여 너를 고쳐 주리라

sentences.original_text: People say that nobody takes care of you,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 당신을 돌보는 사람이 없다고 말합니다,

sentences.original_text: They say that I have chased you out of your land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내가 당신들을 당신의 땅에서 쫓아냈다고 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: But I will give you back your health.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 당신의 건강을 회복시켜 드리겠습니다.
